answer.a11y-message: You can now answer the answers of the question series {{group}}. Press enter to get information about key combinations or call the announcement later with the escape key.
answer.a11y-shortcuts: To go to the current content press the key 1, to switch between contents the right and left arrow keys, to open the user menu the key 9, to get to the room overview the key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
answer.a11y-current-multiple: Content {{index}}, {{question}}. This is a multiple choice content. To go to the answers press the tab key and select an answer the space key.
answer.a11y-current-single: Content {{index}}, {{question}}. This is a single choice content. To go to the answers press the tab key select an answer press the arrow keys.
answer.a11y-current-text: Content {{index}}, {{question}}. This is a open question. To go to the answer input press the tab key.
answer.a11y-current-slide: Content {{index}}, {{question}}. This is a slide. Navigate with tab to the content.
answer.a11y-already-answered: You have already answered the content {{question}}. Navigate with tab to your answer or answers or press the space button to see the results.
answer.a11y-already-answered-single: You have answered to this content with the answer {{answers}}.
answer.a11y-already-answered-multiple: You have answered to this content with the answers {{answers}}.
answer.a11y-already-answered-text: You have answered to this content with {{answer}}.
answer.a11y-has-abstained: You abstained on that content. Press the tab key to hear the content again.
answer.a11y-last-content: This was the last content of this question series. Press the key 0 to return to room overview.
answer.a11y-submit: Sends the answer and go to the next one.
answer.a11y-abstain: Abstain on this content and go to the next one.
answer.a11y-go-to-stats: Flips the card and shows the statistic of this content.
answer.a11y-go-to-content: Flips the card back and shows the content.
answer.a11y-back: Shows the front of the flashcard.
answer.a11y-show-back: Show the back of the flashcard.
answer.at-least-one: Please select at least one answer.
answer.has-answered: You have answered to the content.
answer.questions-locked: No contents have been released yet.
answer.group-not-available: This question series is not available
answer.state-changed: The content list has been updated.

content.a11y-wordcloud-info: Used keywords by frequency in descending order.

comment-list.a11y-filter-correct: Filters all posts marked as correct
comment-list.a11y-filter-wrong: Filters all posts marked as wrong
comment-list.a11y-select-time: Set the period for the posts to be displayed
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1h: Show all posts of the last hour
comment-list.a11y-select-time-3h: Show all posts of the last 3 hours
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1d: Show all posts of the last day
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1w: Show all posts of the last week
comment-list.comment-got-favorited: A post of yours got favorited.
comment-list.comment-sent-to-moderator: Your post will be reviewed by a moderator.

comment-page.a11y-shortcuts: To create a post, press the key 1. Once there are several posts, you can search and filter posts. To browse the posts press key 2, to sort posts key 3, to filter posts key 4, to select the time period key 5, to pause or resume the post stream key 6, to go to the first post key 7, to go to the user menu key 9, to go back to the room overview key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
comment-page.a11y-message: You are now on the Q&A page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-comment-answered: Go the the answer of this post
comment-page.a11y-text-correct: This post was marked as correct.
comment-page.a11y-text-grade: This post was marked as favorite.
comment-page.a11y-text-wrong: This post was marked as not correct.
comment-page.a11y-entered-answer: This post has been answered with: {{answer}}.
comment-page.comment: The post {{ comment }} was asked at {{ time }} and has currently {{ votes }}. {{correct}} {{wrong}} {{bonus}} {{answer}}
comment-page.mark-not-correct: Marked as correct by the professor
comment-page.mark-not-favorite: Marked as favorite by the professor.
comment-page.mark-not-wrong: Marked as wrong by the professor
comment-page.new-comment: A new post with the content, {{ comment }}, has been asked.
comment-page.search-box-input-description: Here you can search for posts.

survey.a11y-message: You are now in live feedback mode. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or use the Escape key to call up the announcement later.
survey.a11y-shortcuts: To know the status of the current survey press key 5, to select the first answer key 1, to select the second answer key 2, to select the third answer key 3, to select the fourth answer key 4, to access the user menu key 9, to return to the room overview key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
survey.a11y-status: Currently the survey is {{status}}. {{answers}} participants have answered yet. {{state0}} percent have selected answer {{answer0}}, {{state1}} percent have selected answer {{answer1}}, {{state2}} percent have selected answer {{answer2}}, {{state3}} percent have selected answer {{answer3}}.
survey.a11y-feeling-very-good: Signals that you think it's nice..
survey.a11y-feeling-good: Signals that you think it's good.
survey.a11y-feeling-not-so-good: Signals that you think it's not that good.
survey.a11y-feeling-bad: Signals that you think it's bad.

room-page.a11y-room-message: You're in the room {{name}} now. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.a11y-shortcuts: To access the Q&A page press key 1, to access the live feedback key 2, to navigate through the question series key 3, to access the user menu key 9, to access the back button key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
room-page.a11y-comments: Opens the page where you can create posts and vote up or down other posts.
room-page.a11y-statistics: Opens the statistics for the question series.
room-page.a11y-content-groups: In this room there are {{count}} question series. Tab between them and press Enter to answer the contents of the question series.
room-page.a11y-no-content-groups: There are no contents in this room yet.
room-page.a11y-live-survey-disabled: The live feedback is currently not active.

statistic.a11y-message-overview: You are now on the statistics overview. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
statistic.a11y-message-evaluation-answers: You can now see the results. {{answers}} participants have answered the content. Navigate through the answers with the tab key or press the space key to return to your answer.
statistic.a11y-shortcuts-overview: To go to the selection of the question series, press the Tab key. Then navigate through the results of the question series. To get to the user menu press the 9 key, to get back to the room overview press the 0 key or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
statistic.a11y-group-progress: {{percent}} percent of the contents in the question series {{group}} were answered correctly.
statistic.a11y-content-result: The content {{content}} has been answered by {{count}} persons so far, {{abstentions}} persons have abstained.
statistic.a11y-choice-result: The content was answered correctly by {{percent}} percent.
statistic.a11y-go-to-statistic: Press the Enter key to get to the evaluation of the content.
statistic.a11y-no-more-answers: There are no more answers. Press the right arrow key to go to the next one.
statistic.a11y-answer-indicator: Indicates with the color green which answers are correct.
statistic.a11y-show-chart: Shows a bar chart which displays the evaluation of the answers.
statistic.a11y-no-more-questions: There are no more contents available.
